name: shoot'em up (FreezeGaming)
description:
Are you looking for a great zombie fighting game with soon to be multiplayer and unlockables with cool skins and great power ups?? 

well this is the game for you! 

Right now it's in very early development and is in the first stage of testing, the game is no where near the finished product, but with your help it can be soon!

We need lots of feed back on the game so in any way that works with you would be great

We have a small but strong community in our discord server  https://discord.gg/vTwTbPe where you can join and help us test more and make the game grow!
